abstract: The Digital Domain column last Sunday, about the future of Microsoft Windows software, misstated the given name of Microsoft’s senior vice president overseeing research. He is Rick Rashid, not Rich.
snippet: The Digital Domain column last Sunday, about the future of Microsoft Windows software, misstated the given name of Microsoft’s senior vice president overseeing research. He is Rick Rashid, not Rich.
lead_paragraph: The Digital Domain column last Sunday, about the future of Microsoft Windows software, misstated the given name of Microsoft’s senior vice president overseeing research. He is Rick Rashid, not Rich.

headline.main: Correction: Windows Could Use a Rush of Fresh Air
